comments.author: ahson
comments.content:
great article.

a tribute to jeep lovers, to the desert and pakistan.

comments.author: umar farooq
comments.content: I read earlier this article in the Friday Times. I must commend Umbareen on always writing such a nice articles and selecting varied and different but novel topics.

comments.author: SOHAIL MOGHAL
comments.content: Umbereen gives you a taste of the ‘brave and the untouched’ with this. For me, lost in the infinite ‘no-whereness’ of Karachi, it was a real dose of fresh air. My tributes go to the offroaders…and its a great feeling such people do still exist. And thanks to Allah Pakistan exists too…yet !!

comments.author: M Nasir Khan
comments.content:
Glad to see and know about such a wonderful group rare to see in Pakistan. Just wanted to know, is it open for all ? and if yes, how one can join this group?

best of luck for future ventures,

M. Nasir Khan

comments.author: Syed Javed Hassan
comments.content:
I have just recently moved back to Pakistan from Hong Kong. I really would be interested in joining a club which is activity oriented.

I would very much like to meet you all and join the club. I am the CEO of IGI Insurance Co.

My Telephone number is: 0300-8218546

Look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best Wishes

Javed

comments.author: AbbasJin
comments.content: Nice Team. I would’ve joined you guys if I could afford a jeep. Anway good luck with your journeys.

comments.author: Haroon Siddiqui
comments.content: Article is like rain in the desert,i cant wait to join a club which has no boundaries no limits………superb.

comments.author: masood
comments.content: I am looking for a used jeep in good condition and affordable price, toyota above 1998 model
